subject: Public Speaking
title: Aristotle's Rhetoric
description: A quick win: understand Aristotle's Rhetoric.

hook.text: Aristotle didn't just speak. He systematized how persuasion works.

discovery.text: All effective speeches blend these three elements in different ratios.

twist.text: Two thousand years later, these principles still define great speaking.

climax.text: Understanding ethos, pathos, logos gives you a universal framework.

punchline.text: Aristotle's framework is timeless. Learn it.
